metadata.dc:title: Prótesis total bilateral de cadera en osteonecrosis aséptica post-corticoterapia, en enfermedad de Hodgkin.
[Bilateral total hip prosthesis in an aseptic osteonecrosis following intermittent steroid therapy in hodgkin's disease (author's transl)].
